title: Informatica tightens bond with AWS's AI development tools
description: New features optimized for joint customers include MCP servers to connect governed data with foundation models and a framework for developing agents on the tech giant's platform.
content: Informatica is tightening its bond with AWS.Informatica, which Salesforce acquired on Nov. 18 after the companies first reached an acquisition agreement in May, introduced new features on Dec. 2 desi… [+8685 chars]
